name: I Am (Not) a Lawyer
description:
❗ Click lower right full screen button to view entire screen! ❗ Click the bubbles to converse. Not everything is as it seems with this case. Who’s really the guilty one? Whatever you say is reality, you decide!

Made for Brackeys Jam 2022.1

—

Known Bugs:

  • Choosing exactly two of the “other” option (neither dog angel nor dog devil) will cause the ending to not trigger
  • Repeat button is sometimes not visible on screen

—
